examples.description: Employs GANs to synthesize additional EEG samples, addressing data scarcity.
examples.note: Added for its use of GANs to address data scarcity by synthesizing EEG samples. Note: The reference year (2025) suggests this is a future work and might need to be considered for the scope of this review.
